title: What’s on Google TV: Netflix doesn’t plan ad-supported tier, Disney+ drops Obi-Wan trailer
content:
In streaming news this week, Netflix remains adamant that it has no plans to launch an ad-supported pricing tier as other platforms have, and Disney+ released the long-anticipated first look at its Obi-Wan Kenobi series.

more…

The post What’s on Google TV: Netflix doesn’t plan ad-supported tier, Disney+ drops Obi-Wan trailer appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: As Netflix continues to grow and raise prices over an over, the company says it currently has no plans to adopt an ad-supported model.
